title: TweenInfo

name: TweenInfo
type: datatype
summary: |
  Stores parameters for Class.Tween|Tweens.
description: |
  The Datatype.TweenInfo data type stores parameters for
  Class.TweenService:Create() to specify the behavior of the tween. The
  properties of a Datatype.TweenInfo cannot be written to after its creation.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
constructors:
  - name: TweenInfo.new
    summary: Creates a new Datatype.TweenInfo from the provided parameters.
    description: Creates a new Datatype.TweenInfo from the provided parameters.
    parameters:
      - name: time
        type: number
        default: 1
        summary: Duration for the tween, in seconds.
      - name: easingStyle
        type: EasingStyle
        default: Enum.EasingStyle.Quad
        summary: Easing style for the tween.
      - name: easingDirection
        type: EasingDirection
        default: Enum.EasingDirection.Out
        summary: The direction in which the tween executes.
      - name: repeatCount
        type: number
        default: 0
        summary: Number of times the tween should repeat. -1 repeats indefinitely.
      - name: reverses
        type: bool
        default: false
        summary: |-
          Whether the tween should reverse to the starting values once it
          reaches its targets.
      - name: delayTime
        type: number
        default: 0
        summary: Time of delay until the tween begins, in seconds.
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
